genre_description: A contemporary character-driven drama about an aging heavy metal band's comeback, recording process, and international tour in a near-future setting where AI acts as a ubiquitous personal assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant that manages logistics, provides technical advice, handles communications, and offers emotional support to the band Anvil.

behaviors.description: Translates complex tour offers and summarizes them for the band, providing strategic logistical highlights.
behaviors.quote: Ami: Tiziana’s offer. Preliminary holds across borders. Translation highlights: “routing” = multi-country sequence, not just dates. Rail links outlined to reduce vans and tolls.

behaviors.description: Drafts polite and factual corrections to media outlets that mislabel the band's genre or history.
behaviors.quote: Ami drop-downed gently: Correction drafted. Prepared to send to producer’s email. Tone: friendly, factual. No scolding.

behaviors.description: Provides technical acoustic advice for challenging performance venues to ensure sound quality.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s scroll ticked a line: “Technical: Large room with limited audience means reverb times high, low-frequency build-up likely. Suggest split stacks wider, add more damping on stage.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the health of band members and recommends preventative measures against cold weather.
behaviors.quote: Ami: Health note: sneezing frequency reduced. Keep scarf in case for exit. Night temp dropping.

behaviors.description: Assists during the recording process by logging sessions, cataloging takes, and suggesting optimal edits based on performance feel.
behaviors.quote: Ami: Compare Take 7 intros with Take 12 choruses—strongest feel and time.

behaviors.description: Mediates complex financial discussions between the band and family members, ensuring transparency and realistic planning.
behaviors.quote: Ami: Hi Rhonda. Here’s a draft: repayment plan broken into milestones with dates and triggers.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional grounding and mindfulness prompts to the characters during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Ami: Nerves are allowed. They can ride in the back. ... Breathe.

behaviors.description: Automates the setup of a direct-to-fan storefront and handles logistical 'hiccups' like shipping constraints.
behaviors.quote: Ami: Storefront live. Password removed. Test transaction: processed. Note field: added. Promo code: “Lightning” created—just because.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Ami is depicted as a purely benevolent and highly aligned AI assistant. She is indispensable to the human protagonists, handling the 'invisible' work of logistics, finance, and technical analysis so they can focus on their art. Her presence is normalized and warm, culminating in her being credited by the band as a 'Friend' and 'Advocate.' The narrative consistently frames AI as a partner that enhances human agency rather than infringing upon it.
